channel.title: [718+] Zephyr 718/742, We aim to please
channel.description:
[center] [ We Are Recruiting Staff! ] Features on Zephyr
- Dominion Tower - Gilded Altar - Castle Wars - Squeal of Fortune - Money Pouch - Clan Wars Safe and Risk portal for fun fights. - Duel Arena with Staking. - Glacors with fire spell weekness. - Forinthry Dungeon for pvp items. - Loyalty Shop - Kuradals Dungeon - FightCaves / Fight Kiln with all waves - Queen Black Dragon - Barrows 100% - Jadinko Lair - Frost Dragons - Slayer Tower with all floors (including slayer task system) - Polypore Dungeon - Corporeal Beast - Kalphite Queen - Tormented Demons - Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin - Teleblock fully working = Best Staff [/center] [center][size=12pt]Media![/size][/center] [center] [img]http://puu.sh/3pUT7.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3pUWH.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3pV18.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3pVrs.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3pVbc.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3pUCk.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3pUnO.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3pUkF.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/3pU6j.png[/img]
- Links to Zephyr718 - http://zephyr718.tk/ - webclient http://zephyr718.tk/zephyr.jar - downloadable client http://zephyr718.enjin.com/ - Forums

item.title: [718+] Zephyr 718/742, We aim to please
item.dc:creator: @SkullStew SkullStew
item.description:
@SkullStew wrote:

[center]
[ We Are Recruiting Staff! ]
Features on Zephyr

  • Dominion Tower

  • Gilded Altar

  • Castle Wars

  • Squeal of Fortune

  • Money Pouch

  • Clan Wars Safe and Risk portal for fun fights.

  • Duel Arena with Staking.

  • Glacors with fire spell weekness.

  • Forinthry Dungeon for pvp items.

  • Loyalty Shop

  • Kuradals Dungeon

  • FightCaves / Fight Kiln with all waves

  • Queen Black Dragon

  • Barrows 100%

  • Jadinko Lair

  • Frost Dragons

  • Slayer Tower with all floors (including slayer task system)

  • Polypore Dungeon

  • Corporeal Beast

  • Kalphite Queen

  • Tormented Demons

  • Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin

  • Teleblock fully working
    = Best Staff
    [/center]
